channel.title: Caps not allowed
channel.description:
Hello,
I have just basically perfected my server for launch but I am having a big problem. As a capital letters user, I always put in caps for my name/pass by habit. Is there any way I can fix my client to allow capital letters, and what would be the problem that is making it not use caps?

item.title: Caps not allowed
item.dc:creator: @Delaura Delaura
item.description:
@Delaura wrote:

Hello,

I have just basically perfected my server for launch but I am having a big problem. As a capital letters user, I always put in caps for my name/pass by habit. Is there any way I can fix my client to allow capital letters, and what would be the problem that is making it not use caps?
